feature.label: OpenJML
feature.description: The OpenJML plugin packages an implementation of JML tools for Java 1.6 using the OpenJDK source code base. It includes a JML checker, static checker (ESC), runtime assertion compiler (RAC), and jmldoc.
feature.license: Includes material from: - OpenJDK - the runtime library from FindBugs - the specifications library from org.jmlspecs...
